input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: Tanning salon treatment has a direct effect on skin. Going to the beach has a direct effect on skin. The overall probability of tanning salon treatment is 4%. The probability of no tanning salon treatment and tanned skin is 15%. The probability of tanning salon treatment and tanned skin is 3%. Is the chance of tanned skin larger when observing tanning salon treatment?
